neg review: Didnt feel safe around the station. Almost got pick pocketed.

pos review: Netflix app built into the tv and a good wifi connection. The bed was clean and very comfortable.
neg review: The area the hotel is in isn't great. And you should bring earplugs because it's really easy to hear people walking through the corridors. The shower was ok when I could get the right temperature but it basically had a mind of its own!

pos review: Only the location. It is near to Central so grand place is 25 minutes by walk
It's just a small room with attached bathroom without any standard facilities like, telephone, iron, locker, fridge etc. No daily room cleaning
Floors was filthy. Cold room . Pillows cover smelly
The bed was excellent and the room was very quiet as it faced the rear courtyard

neg review:
The room wasnt cleas as it noted .
The bathroom had  very big window and it was prety cold .
You might freeze while making a shower.
